message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.RO 

The paper presents a machine learning algorithm for continuous, lifelong learning, which is a topic that falls under the categories of machine learning (cs.LG), neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision and pattern recognition (cs.CV), and robotics (cs.RO). The paper specifically focuses on the integration of neuromodulatory mechanisms in the algorithm, which is a subfield of neural and evolutionary computing. Therefore, cs.LG and cs.NE are the most likely categories, followed by cs.AI, cs.CV, and cs.RO.
